todo.title: XFCE terminal
todo.text: 1. Under XFCE terminal program ("Terminal") there was a strange behavior of backspace button in your program - it generated some strange symbols, but don't do the symbol deleting. I checked it under urxvt and everything was fine. So I'd to config XFCE terminal in that way, that pressing backspace was generating "Control-H" (before that it was set to automatic) I'm not really sure this is a problem of your program, but I'd never met such problem with this terminal.
